subtitle: The modern desktop writing studio designed for the next generation of authors. Combine the simplicity of a distraction-free editor with powerful world-building tools.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Organize entire series and books with an intuitive drag-and-drop hierarchy. Structure your work with Chapters, and Scenes. all in one unified workspace.

distractionFreeEditor.title: Distraction-Free Editor
distractionFreeEditor.description: Experience a smooth, Notion-like writing environment without the lag. Rich text editing meets minimalist design for pure creative focus.

worldBuilding.title: World Building
worldBuilding.description: Build immersive universes with detailed character databases, location tracking, and visual timelines. Everything your story needs, interconnected.

flexibleWorkspace.title: Flexible Workspace
flexibleWorkspace.description: Multi-tab support and split views let you work your way. Pin character notes next to your scene, or compare chapters side-by-side.
